description: A. A. F. Farween Vs The Secretary of the Judicial Service Commission and Hon. Attorney General before Hon. Dr. D. F. H. Gunawardhana, J.
parties: A. A. F. Farween Vs The Secretary of the Judicial Service Commission and Hon. Attorney General
judgement_by: Hon. Dr. D. F. H. Gunawardhana, J.
keywords: Application to obtain a Writ of Mandamus against the Secretary of the Judicial Service Commission (JSC) to issue copies of certain documents which is in record of the JSC, sought to be adduced as evidence before the learned District Court; ability of the Petitioner to obtain reliefs sought when alternative remedies are available under the RTI Act.
legistation: The Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
